column5: I understand that the "BEST WESTERN" motel in SIOUX LOOKOUT has closed down ? Any info on this? I really DISLIKE the SUNSET INN...
We stayed at The Forest Inn, it was OK for a night
The best western is anyone with John Wayne!

Jimi, Give the Lamplighter Inn a call. I've stayed there since 1982 and has always been decent. Rooms are basic set up, but have always been clean. They have a good breakfast in the morning if anyone would be interested. PjShorthorn

I attended a meeting at the Best Western in December, they were still open at that time, if they did close that is too bad, they would have been my #1 pick in town. I agree about the Sunset, I stayed in the front building one time, mostly natives, the whole place smelled like cigarette smoke and was not especially clean....The Lamplighter would be your next choice.
I asked my wife who works in sioux.she said its open but the nane has changed to siouxlookout inn and suites.
Thank You ! Looks like They did some "remodeling"
I've stayed at the Lamplighter and it was nice as stated before here.
Yes.... Booked the "LAMPLIGHTER" ... Although, I understand it is "FOR SALE"
